Player History
Drafted in 24th round, 373rd overall pick, by Montreal in 2015...
Had first career hit on 5/16/2015, off Thomas Svoboda (DET)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/29/2015, off Agustin Vega (SF)...
Signed as a free agent by Boston on 2/9/2016 to a 3-year deal worth $850,000 per year...
Injured on 7/24/2016 with a Blurred Vision Eye, out for 2 weeks...

Was claimed off waivers by Kansas City on 4/12/2019.
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against New York on 9/14/2019...
Released by Kansas City on 10/5/2020...

Released by Houston on 5/6/2021...
